name: Flickholdr
body: ### Flickholdr This dummy image generator is the best way to beautify your in development projects. It allows you to pull photos from flickr, based on the tags you choose. They are chosen from the "interesting" images on Flickr which ensures you get some of the most beautiful imagery available on the web. Flickholdr only gets photos with a creative commons license and adds proper attibution on each image, making sure you can use them in any context ## Using flickholdr It's very easy: simply use a special `src` attribute in your images, which you can get on the image chooser in [flickholdr.com](http://flickholdr.com) For example this html code `` will generate the following image:
tagline: Dummy images from flickr, by tags
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
